VoronoiPattern: Method to generate next group of voronoi sites
NormalOffset: Offset point samples in the vertex normal directions
Variability: Amount to randomly displace each Voronoi site (in cm)
SitesToAdd: Number of Voronoi sites to add
GridX: Number of sites to add to grid in X
GridY: Number of sites to add to grid in Y
GridZ: Number of sites to add to grid in Z
SkipMode: Strategy used for skipping points; only used if SkipFraction is greater than 0
bStartAtActor: Whether to use the reference mesh actor's transform when placing the Voronoi sites, or center them at the current gizmo location instead
